sentences.en: Feral populations have sprung up in Sydney, Perth and Hobart from the release of unwanted birds.
sentences.cn: 因为在悉尼 、 佩思和霍巴特的多余鸟类放养而使得种群快速生长.

sentences.en: Hobart is a strange place in which to write book about post modernization.
sentences.cn: 在霍巴特这个地方写一本有关后现代的书是很奇怪的.

sentences.en: Hobart Town, by degrees, grew to be a fine city, with handsome buildings and well kept streets.
sentences.cn: 霍巴特镇在一定程度上已经演变为一个惬意的城市，街道整齐，建筑物大方气派；

sentences.en: The Hobart flights were paid for by Wellington - based Omeka Communications , air industry sources told Fairfax.
sentences.cn: 航空业内人士还透露,惠灵顿的奥莫卡通信会支付霍巴特航空.

sentences.en: There, at the very foot of the lofty Mount Wellington, Hobart Town began to grow in its new situation.
sentences.cn: 这里正处于高耸的威灵顿山脚下，一个新的霍巴特镇开始在这里成长。

sentences.en: To obtain the latest Beijing to Hobart International ticket special real - time information.
sentences.cn: 以获取最新的北京到霍巴特国际特价机票 实时 信息.

trans.tran_cn: 霍巴特（澳大利亚塔斯马尼亚岛东南岸港市）
